display.title: Botany Pot
display.description:
Use botany pots to grow mystical agriculture plants and other crops. 

Place a hopper botany pot above an inventory to harvest automatically. 

Mystical agriculture plants need special farmland to grow in botany pots (see JEI), as do some higher tier crops that require cruxes. 

Botany pots can be upgraded (see JEI), but cannot be affected by GAG's temporal pouch (time in a bottle).
